details: Resolved issues to improve system stability and performance.
Contributed to maintaining and improving key projects, ensuring reliability and efciency.
Identied and addressed bottlenecks to optimize application functionality.
Developed and maintained client-side code to ensure functionality and improve user experience.
Converted Figma designs into Angular interfaces with attention to detail.
Optimized front-end performance and accessibility, following industry standards.
Managed form creation for KYC projects, improving data collection and processing.
Wrote 300+ unit tests with Jest to improve code reliability.
Participated in Agile CI/CD processes to support sprints and deployments.
Maintained and updated website content to ensure accuracy and relevance for a local delivery
Managed packages and dependencies on Linux for optimized system operation.
Conducted regular maintenance and performance tuning for server environments.
